[bug][build] Fix build error if ptab.json is empty
ext-redmine: #6247, REDMINE-6247
[Description in detail]
Change-Id: If9529780417552569caba584d29009dbbf8a224f

[bug][build]Change the env configuration in the example directory under the main branch to the new method (no need to manually create it)
redmine: #6133, REDMINE-6133
ext-redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
[Description in detail]
Change-Id: I8a40f869b10d8ac22b366af3c3d8968e67505bcd

[bug][build]Change the way of creating the env for the remaining projects in the "example" directory to one that does not require manual creation.
redmine: #6393, REDMINE-6393
ext-redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
[Description in detail]
Change-Id: I2e14a968074afc150236e8e15ac1ee7be5ae3805

[bug][LCDC] Waiting LCDC busy flag to be cleared in it's deinit function
redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine: #6454, REDMINE-6454
[Description in detail] RAMLESS interfaces maybe still working(reading PSRAM) after deinit function, and that will cause an error when the PSRAM trying to enter sleeping mode.
Change-Id: I4529aa1802e9ddd0706256096ec114a1488fe6a0

[new][example] Add the gui_guider routine
redmine: #5959, REDMINE-5959
ext-redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
[Description in detail] 1.Transplant the code files generated by gui_guider 2.Added the ezip compression function 3.Wrote the corresponding readme document
Change-Id: Ib083dac2d0b0102892308b93782e9f1e71fad8de

[new][example] Add the Squareline routine
redmine: #5960, REDMINE-5960
ext-redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
[Description in detail] 1.Use the image control in Squareline and obtain the generated .c file 2.Compress the generated .c file using ezip. 3.Apply the generated file on the SDK and display it on the screen. 4.Prepare the corresponding Readme document
Change-Id: I6958a6e4a953ff821396dfbc9d88757ceb999a9c

[bug][LCDC] Waiting LCDC busy flag to be cleared in it's deinit function
redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine: #6454, REDMINE-6454
[Description in detail] RAMLESS interfaces maybe still working(reading PSRAM) after deinit function, and that will cause an error when the PSRAM trying to enter sleeping mode.
Change-Id: I4529aa1802e9ddd0706256096ec114a1488fe6a0

[new][bt] add pan autoconnect func
redmine: #6672, REDMINE-6672
ext-redmine: #id, REDMINE-id

Change-Id: I7c40b99d697ad199340b351822edcfc87c71170b

[bug][example][watch_v9] Fix build error with board eh-lb523 using Keil
ext-redmine: #5799, REDMINE-5799
[Description in detail] Only put code in PSRAM, rodata is still in flash, such as font data. This is what GCC build does
Change-Id: I0e263d9ded3b6be8749310c16c8cdfdb29f8206b (cherry picked from commit 876ede0df60ec1267688ec5d2bf4b133411f7821)
